Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages.setup.server

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ChooseLeadersMessage
    message sent when a client has to choose which leaderCards to keep
    ChooseResourcesMessage
    message sent when a client has to choose the starting resource(s)
    CloseMatchMessage  
    DisconnectionMessage
    Message to notify the player that another player has disconnected.
    DoLoginMessage
    the login message the server sends to each client after establishing the connection
    EndGameMessage
    Message to notify the game is finished due to errors
    EndLocalMatchMessage  
    LastRoundMessage  
    LeaderCardsUpdateMessage  
    LoginDoneMessage
    message sent after the server checks if the login is correct
    LoginRefusedMessage  
    NewUserLogged
    Message sent to the other clients when a new player joins the match
    PlayTurnMessage
    message sent to alert a user that it is his turn
    SelectResourcesMessage
    message sent to tell the player to choose his initial resources
    SetGameBoardMessage
    message to setup the game board
